cards.text: rsary TEXT: [C] During your Opponent's turn, all your other Characters gain +500 Power. [S] BRAINSTORM [(1)] Flip over the top 2 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Haha, is that so, this is that, the rumored person about the founding
cards.name: Meme Oshino, Authority on Monster Changing

cards.text: [C] During your Opponent's turn, this gains +1000 Power. [A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from hand to the Waiting Room]
cards.name: Nadeko Sengoku, Cursed Girl

cards.text: [A] CHANGE [(1) Put this in Clock] At the start of your Encore Step, if this is Rested, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Nadeko Sengoku, Snake-Coiled Girl" in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in.
cards.flavor: Ah...... Koyomi onii-chan. I've been waiting for you
cards.name: Nadeko Sengoku, Ambushing

cards.text: stress TEXT: [C] During your Opponent's turn, all your other ::Chairman:: Characters gain +500 Power. [A] BOND/"Tsubasa Hanekawa" [(1)]
cards.flavor: Oshino thought of that too...... but we still don't know the source
cards.name: Koyomi Araragi, Running Around

cards.text: [C] During your Opponent's turn, this gains +1000 Power.
cards.name: Nadeko Sengoku, Curse Removal Ritual

cards.text: [S] [Rest 2 of your Characters] This gains +1000 Power until next end of your Opponent's turn.
cards.flavor: Oh? I thought this is normal
cards.name: Tsubasa Hanekawa, Knowing Everything

cards.text: -- None --
cards.name: Cat-Eared Tsubasa Hanekawa

cards.text: EXT: -- None --
cards.flavor: Koyomi nii-san... and Kanbaru-san... Can you turn around for a little
cards.name: Nadeko Sengoku, Girl of Age

cards.text: [C] ASSIST All your Level 2 or higher Characters in front of this gain +1000 Power. [C] EXPERIENCE If the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 4 or higher, this gains the following ability. "[C] During your Opponent's turn, all your other ::Strange:: Characters gain +500 Power."
cards.name: Tsubasa Hanekawa

cards.text: [S] [Counter] BACKUP 3000, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from hand to the Waiting Room]
cards.flavor: I'm so busy that I don't really have time
cards.name: Meme Oshino, Man Who Sees Through Everything

cards.text: [C] You cannot use "[A] ENCORE" of your other Characters. (This includes "[A] ENCORE [(3)]" provided by the rules)
cards.name: "Energy Drain" Black Hanekawa

cards.text: Draw up to 2 cards, and discard a card from hand to your Waiting Room. Choose 1 of your ::Strange:: Characters, and that Character gains +3000 Power for the turn.
cards.name: Don't Tell Anyone

cards.text: [C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
cards.name: Nadeko Snake

cards.text: [C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.
cards.name: My Everything

cards.text: [A] When this is placed from hand to the Climax Zone, put the top card of your Library in Stock, and all your Characters gain +1 Soul for the turn.
cards.name: Tsubasa Cat
